statements: SELECT * FROM waste_management_practices;
SELECT destination_name, recycling_efforts FROM waste_management_practices;
SELECT destination_id, destination_name FROM waste_management_practices WHERE recycling_efforts = TRUE;
SELECT destination_id, destination_name FROM waste_management_practices WHERE destination_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_practices ORDER BY destination_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_practices WHERE destination_name = 'Recycling Center';
SELECT destination_id, destination_name FROM waste_management_practices WHERE recycling_efforts = TRUE;
SELECT destination_name FROM waste_management_practices ORDER BY destination_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_destinations FROM waste_management_practices;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_practices WHERE destination_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM waste_management_practices;
SELECT destination_name, recycling_level FROM waste_management_practices WHERE recycling_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM waste_categories WHERE category_name = 'Plastics';
SELECT destination_name, recycling_level FROM waste_management_practices WHERE destination_id = 1;
SELECT category_name, recycling_policy FROM waste_categories;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_practices WHERE recycling_level > 3 ORDER BY destination_name ASC;
SELECT destination_name, recycling_level FROM waste_management_practices WHERE recycling_level <= 2;
SELECT destination_name, category_name FROM waste_management_practices JOIN waste_categories ON waste_management_practices.destination_id = waste_categories.category_id;
SELECT category_name, recycling_policy FROM waste_categories WHERE LENGTH(recycling_policy) > 100;
SELECT destination_id, destination_name FROM waste_management_practices WHERE destination_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY destination_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementPractices;
SELECT location_name, recycling_program FROM WasteManagementPractices;
SELECT bin_id, bin_capacity, bin_status FROM RecyclingBins;
SELECT location_id, collection_date, quantity_collected FROM WasteCollectionHistory;
SELECT location_name, recycling_program, waste_collection_schedule FROM WasteManagementPractices;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementPractices ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name, recycling_program FROM WasteManagementPractices WHERE recycling_program = 'Yes';
SELECT r.bin_id, r.location_id, r.bin_capacity, w.location_name FROM RecyclingBins r JOIN WasteManagementPractices w ON r.location_id = w.location_id;

SELECT w.location_id, w.location_name, COUNT(h.collection_id) AS total_collections FROM WasteManagementPractices w LEFT JOIN WasteCollectionHistory h ON w.location_id = h.location_id GROUP BY w.location_id;

SELECT w.location_name, h.collection_date, h.collected_waste_type, h.quantity_collected FROM WasteManagementPractices w JOIN WasteCollectionHistory h ON w.location_id = h.location_id WHERE h.quantity_collected > 100;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_destinations;
SELECT id, destination_name, country FROM waste_management_destinations WHERE recycling_program = TRUE;
SELECT city, COUNT(*) AS total_points FROM waste_collection_points GROUP BY city;
SELECT category_name, landfill FROM waste_categories WHERE organic = TRUE;
SELECT point_name, location_description, capacity FROM waste_collection_points ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_destinations ORDER BY country, city DESC;
SELECT destination_name, country, city FROM waste_management_destinations WHERE recycling_program = TRUE;
SELECT point_name, city, capacity FROM waste_collection_points WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT category_name, recyclable, landfill, organic FROM waste_categories WHERE recyclable = TRUE OR landfill = TRUE;
SELECT collection_date, weight_kg FROM waste_collection_logs WHERE weight_kg > 500 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_sites;
SELECT site_id, site_name, location FROM waste_management_sites ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_bins WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY bin_location DESC;
SELECT bin_id, bin_location, waste_accepted FROM recycling_bins WHERE waste_accepted = 'plastic';
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_lead, phone_number FROM waste_collection_team;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT site_name, location, waste_type FROM waste_management_sites WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT * FROM recycling_bins WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY bin_location ASC;
SELECT site_name, day_of_week, collection_time FROM waste_collection_schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' AND collection_time > '10:00:00';
SELECT team_name, phone_number FROM waste_collection_team WHERE team_name LIKE '%Recycling%';
